String.Source: All right. I'm ready to go if you are.
String.Dest: 那好吧。如果你需要，我准备好出发了。

String.Source: Good. I don't know if Giants sleep, so now is as good a time as any.
String.Dest: 好的，我不知道巨人已经睡了，现在是大好时机啊！

String.Source: All right. I'm ready to go if you are.
String.Dest: 那好吧。如果你需要，我准备好出发了。

String.Source: Okay. The night might give us some cover. I'm not much for sneaking though, so fair warning.
String.Dest: 好的。夜色会给我们做掩护。我得事先提醒一点，我不怎么擅长潜行。

String.Source: The only thing that scares me is having you as my companion.
String.Dest: 我唯一害怕的事就是你给我当随从。

String.Source: Ha, knowing my history, that's the smartest thing you could ever say.
String.Dest: 哈，这么了解我的过往，这是你所能说的最聪明的事了。

String.Source: Sounds dangerous. Sounds fun.
String.Dest: 听起来很危险，听起来很有趣。

String.Source: So, you're another thrill seeker, huh. Well, you should know this is a serious job. People could die. People like us.
String.Dest: 所以，你也是个探险者，呵呵。好吧，你应该知道这是一个严肃的职业。像我们这样的人，随时都可能丧命。

String.Source: Sounds dangerous. Sounds fun.
String.Dest: 听起来很危险，听起来很有趣。

String.Source: Well, you anyway. I've got luck on my side.
String.Dest: 随便你怎么样，运气在我这边。

String.Source: I think I'd rather just retire to my room. And from adventuring altogether.
String.Dest: 比起整日在外冒险，我想我还是选择退隐在家好了。

String.Source: Well, you could, but it'd probably eat you alive, leaving all that gold on the table.
String.Dest: 你可以那么做， 但是它可能会要了你的命，把那些金币全给我留在桌子上。

String.Source: Giants don't scare me.
String.Dest: 巨人吓不倒我的。

String.Source: Good. You're gonna need to be a little crazy if you want to make it out of this alive.
String.Dest: 不错。想要好好理解这个，你得稍微冒点傻气。

String.Source: Tell me about this job.
String.Dest: 跟我说说这个工作。

String.Source: Well, I don't want to scare you off, but we're supposed to raid a Giant camp.
String.Dest: 好吧，我不想把你吓跑，但我们要洗劫的地方是一座巨人营地来着。

String.Source: Tell me about this job.
String.Dest: 跟我说说这个工作。

String.Source: What exactly is in this Giant camp?
String.Dest: 巨人的营地里到底有什么?

String.Source: Well, supposedly some fool is holed up in Sleeping Tree Cave, with something more valuable than old the gold in Dragonsreach.
String.Dest: 这么说，很可能有个白痴躲在沉睡之树洞穴里了，他带的东西肯定比龙临堡的古币还值钱。

String.Source: Tell me about this job.
String.Dest: 跟我说说这个工作。

String.Source: What exactly is in this Giant camp?
String.Dest: 巨人的营地里到底有什么?

String.Source: Dead or alive, our job is to relieve him of his belongings.
String.Dest: 不管是死是活，我们的工作都是偷走他的财产。

String.Source: Actually, I've never had it. Is it any good?
String.Dest: 事实上，我从来没有。它有什么好处？

String.Source: Oh brother, what is it now?
String.Dest: 哦兄弟，那现在呢？

String.Source: Well, you're not gonna like this but...this Argonian isn't the guy. I know because he's the one who hired me.
String.Dest: 这个亚龙人不是那个人。是他雇佣了我，所以这点我很清楚。

String.Source: Actually, I've never had it. Is it any good?
String.Dest: 事实上，我从来没有。它有什么好处？

String.Source: Oh brother, what is it now?
String.Dest: 哦兄弟，那现在呢？

String.Source: And judging by the arrow in his chest, it wasn't any Giant that killed him.
String.Dest: 从他胸部所中的箭来判断，他可不是被那帮巨人所杀的。

String.Source: Actually, I've never had it. Is it any good?
String.Dest: 事实上，我从来没有。它有什么好处？

String.Source: It's terrible, but it hits all the right spots. You know, if you're the adventurous type, maybe you can help me out.
String.Dest: 有些糟糕，不过他们都集中了正确的地方。你知道，如果你胆子够大的话也许你能给我帮上忙。

String.Source: Actually, I've never had it. Is it any good?
String.Dest: 事实上，我从来没有。它有什么好处？

String.Source: I've got a job I need help on. Real suicide mission. Most jobs I take are. After all, there's a reason they call me Ignar the Lucky.
String.Dest: 我有个任务并且我需要帮助。大部分我所拿到的任务都是自杀性的任务。所以他们才称我为幸运者伊格奈。

String.Source: I don't know, it tastes pretty smooth to me.
String.Dest: 不知道，我觉得挺爽口的。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: This Argonian isn't the guy. I know because he's the one who hired me.
String.Dest: 这个亚龙人不是那个人。是他雇佣了我，所以这点我很清楚。

String.Source: I don't know, it tastes pretty smooth to me.
String.Dest: 不知道，我觉得挺爽口的。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: And judging by the arrow in his chest, it wasn't any Giant that killed him.
String.Dest: 从他胸部所中的箭来判断，他可不是被那帮巨人所杀的。

String.Source: I don't know, it tastes pretty smooth to me.
String.Dest: 不知道，我觉得挺爽口的。

String.Source: Is that right? If you like hard drinks, maybe you like hard jobs too. This one's a real suicide mission.
String.Dest: 对不对？如果你喜欢喝酒的话，也许你也喜欢干点儿难啃的活儿。这是名符其实的传奇难度任务。

String.Source: I don't know, it tastes pretty smooth to me.
String.Dest: 不知道，我觉得挺爽口的。

String.Source: After all, there's a reason they call me Ignar the Lucky.
String.Dest: 所以他们才称我为幸运者伊格奈。

String.Source: Great. I should've figured something like this would happen. Just my luck.
String.Dest: 太好了。我本该想到这样的事会发生的。只是走运。

String.Source: You're a tough one. Don't know anyone else who'd drink that swill. Well, anyone besides me.
String.Dest: 你真是个狠角色。没见过你这么能喝的。嗯，至少在我认识的人里面。

String.Source: What will you do now?
String.Dest: 你现在有什么打算？

String.Source: Going to Robber's Refuge. That's where the Argonian said his friends are. Might stick around and see if I can't get some more work.
String.Dest: 去盗贼庇护所，那个亚龙人说他的朋友们都在那里。我或许回去那边转转看看能不能拿到点活。

String.Source: Wait, if everyone with you dies, does that mean you're trying to kill me?
String.Dest: 等等，如果每个人都死了，那是不是说明你想杀了我？

String.Source: No. I'm trying to keep me safe, and numbers always help. A little luck never hurts either.
String.Dest: 不。我只是想保证自己的安全，一群人总是有好处的。一点点运气不会伤害到谁。

String.Source: Wait, if everyone with you dies, does that mean you're trying to kill me?
String.Dest: 等等，如果每个人都死了，那是不是说明你想杀了我？

String.Source: That's why I wear the name proudly. I really do feel like the luckiest man alive. And that's the key word. Alive.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么我为得到了这个称号而骄傲。我真的感觉自己是活着的最幸运的男人。重音放在"活着的"那三个字上。

String.Source: Wait, if everyone with you dies, does that mean you're trying to kill me?
String.Dest: 等等，如果每个人都死了，那是不是说明你想杀了我？

String.Source: Sure you might die. But you might also get rich. As far as key words go, that's yours.
String.Dest: 当然你可能会死的。但你也可能会变得富有。至于去还是不去，那取决于你。

String.Source: You don't mind being called that name?
String.Dest: 你不介意被叫那个名字？

String.Source: Not at all. I really do feel like the luckiest man alive. And that's the key word. Alive.
String.Dest: 一点儿也不。我真的觉得我是世界上最幸运的男人。最关键的是，我还活着。

String.Source: So is the name meant to be ironic?
String.Dest: 所以这名字具有讽刺意味啰？

String.Source: What, you mean like the opposite of lucky? Oh no, those other mercs may be dead, but I'm still alive. That's a good thing.
String.Dest: 什么，你的意思是跟幸运恰恰相反？噢，不，那些人现在可能已经死了，但我还活着。这是件好事。

String.Source: Do you consider yourself lucky?
String.Dest: 你觉得你很幸运吗?

String.Source: Oh yeah. I'm still alive, and that's a hell of a lot better than being dead.
String.Dest: 哦好极了。我还活着，好死不如赖活着啊。

String.Source: So, what happened?
String.Dest: 那么，发生了什么？

String.Source: Same thing that always happens. We go in there and it takes all of two seconds for him to smash the bear's skull in.
String.Dest: 同样的事总在发生，我们进去那里，然后他花了大概两秒钟的时间敲碎熊的头骨。

String.Source: So, what happened?
String.Dest: 那么，发生了什么？

String.Source: I just stood there looking like an idiot. Never seen anything like it.
String.Dest: 我站在那里看起来像个白痴。我从没见过像那样的东西。

String.Source: So, what happened?
String.Dest: 那么，发生了什么？

String.Source: Hjor comes over and pats me on the back. He says, "See, there's no such thing as bad luck."
String.Dest: 肖尔走过来轻拍我的后背，他说，“你看，这儿也并不全都是坏运气。”

String.Source: So, what happened?
String.Dest: 那么，发生了什么？

String.Source: Only he never finished the sentence. Stepped on a bear trap the owner placed near the entrance. It took off half his leg.
String.Dest: 也只有他的苦难一直不曾间断过。在大门附近他一脚踩在了主人放在入口附近的捕熊器上！直接被夹断了半条腿！

String.Source: He could have been just curious.
String.Dest: 他当时只是好奇吧？

String.Source: Maybe, but whatever it was, it got him killed. Didn't start out that way though. Took him all of two seconds to smash the bear's skull in.
String.Dest: Maybe, but whatever it was, it got him killed. Didn't start out that way though. Took him all of two seconds to smash the bear's skull in.

String.Source: He could have been just curious.
String.Dest: 他当时只是好奇吧？

String.Source: I just stood there looking like an idiot. Never seen anything like it.
String.Dest: 我站在那里看起来像个白痴。我从没见过像那样的东西。

String.Source: He could have been just curious.
String.Dest: 他当时只是好奇吧？

String.Source: Hjor comes over and pats me on the back. He says, "See, there's no such thing as bad luck."
String.Dest: 肖尔走过来轻拍我的后背，他说，“你看，这儿也并不全都是坏运气。”

String.Source: He could have been just curious.
String.Dest: 他当时只是好奇吧？

String.Source: Only he never finished the sentence. Stepped on a bear trap the owner placed near the entrance. It took off half his leg!
String.Dest: 只是他还没说完这句话，就一脚踩在了主人放在入口附近的捕熊器上！直接被夹断了半条腿！

String.Source: Sounds like a stubborn fool.
String.Dest: 听起来像一个顽固的傻瓜。

String.Source: Stubborn, but as tough as a mammoth hide. Anyway, we go in there and it takes all of two seconds for him to smash the bear's skull in.
String.Dest: 是很顽固，可是却跟张猛犸皮一样强硬。无论如何，我们去那里，只给他两秒钟的时间就能砸碎巨熊的头骨。

String.Source: Sounds like a stubborn fool.
String.Dest: 听起来像一个顽固的傻瓜。

String.Source: I just stood there looking like an idiot. Never seen anything like it.
String.Dest: 我站在那里看起来像个白痴。我从没见过像那样的东西。

String.Source: Sounds like a stubborn fool.
String.Dest: 听起来像一个顽固的傻瓜。

String.Source: Hjor comes over and pats me on the back. He says, "See, there's no such thing as bad luck."
String.Dest: 肖尔走过来轻拍我的后背，他说，“你看，这儿也并不全都是坏运气。”

String.Source: Sounds like a stubborn fool.
String.Dest: 听起来像一个顽固的傻瓜。

String.Source: Only he never finished the sentence. Stepped on a bear trap the owner placed near the entrance. It took off half his leg!
String.Dest: 只是他还没说完这句话，就一脚踩在了主人放在入口附近的捕熊器上！直接被夹断了半条腿！

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Simple. Every job I've ever done, no one's made it out alive but me.
String.Dest: 简单。每一项工作我都做过，除了我没有人可以活着应对它。

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Doesn't matter how easy the job or how tough the warrior. It never fails.
String.Dest: 工作有多简单或者战士有多坚强，都不是问题。总是这样。

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: First time it happened, they said I was the lucky one. Hence the name.
String.Dest: First time it happened, they said I was the lucky one. Hence the name.

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Tell me about one of your earlier jobs.
String.Dest: 说说你以前的工作。

String.Source: Sure. Once got hired to clear out a bandit fort with some mage. Young and talented type, always talking about how he was going to be somebody.
String.Dest: 没问题。每次我被雇佣去跟一些法师一起清理强盗的堡垒的时候。那些年轻而又有天分的，总是会畅谈未来。

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Tell me about one of your earlier jobs.
String.Dest: 说说你以前的工作。

String.Source: We go in, and take 'em all out save for some archer in the tower. I tease the kid, tell him, with my luck, that's your killer right there.
String.Dest: 我们冲了进去，除了几个弓手外，整座塔被我们清扫一空。我带着我非凡的运气，嘲弄那年轻人说他的死神就在这里。

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Tell me about one of your earlier jobs.
String.Dest: 说说你以前的工作。

String.Source: The mage looks at me and says, "Who? The corpse?" Then he lights him up with the biggest fireball I've ever seen.
String.Dest: 那位法师看着我然后说，"谁？尸体么？"然后他用我这辈子见过的最大的火球把他给点燃了。

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Tell me about one of your earlier jobs.
String.Dest: 说说你以前的工作。

String.Source: The archer though, he manages to stumble off the tower, and sure enough, lands right on the mage.
String.Dest: 然而那个弓手，他从塔楼上摔了下来，而且不偏不倚，正好掉到法师身上。

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Tell me about one of your earlier jobs.
String.Dest: 说说你以前的工作。

String.Source: The two of them light up like a bonfire. Ha, he had it right along. His future really was bright.
String.Dest: 这两件东西像一堆篝火一样亮着。哈哈，他找对方法了。他的前途一片光明啊！

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Tell me about one of your previous jobs.
String.Dest: 给我随便讲讲你以前的工作。

String.Source: All right. I once did a job with a Companion named Hjor.
String.Dest: 好吧。我曾经和一位叫做肖尔的战友一起做过活。

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Tell me about one of your previous jobs.
String.Dest: 给我随便讲讲你以前的工作。

String.Source: Now, a lot of smart people refuse to work with me. But even more think of it as a challenge. Which is fine by me. Not my neck that's on the line.
String.Dest: 很多聪明人都拒绝跟我合作。不过你可以把这看成是一次挑战。我是没啥问题。可我的脖子就真不一定了。

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Tell me about one of your previous jobs.
String.Dest: 给我随便讲讲你以前的工作。

String.Source: Hjor was famous for killing bears. Extermination jobs, is what he called them.
String.Dest: 肖罗因猎熊而闻名。他会把猎熊称为灭绝工作。

String.Source: Why do they call you Ignar the Lucky?
String.Dest: 为什么他们把你称为幸运者伊格奈？

String.Source: Tell me about one of your previous jobs.
String.Dest: 给我随便讲讲你以前的工作。

String.Source: So he asks me to help him clear a bear out of some shack. He doesn't even need my help. Just wants to prove a point.
String.Dest: 所以他让我帮他搞清楚那头熊是不是已经离开棚屋了。他甚至不需要我的帮助，只是想搞清楚这一点罢了。

String.Source: Who do you think it was that killed him?
String.Dest: 你认为是谁杀了他？

String.Source: Don't know who killed him. But I do know what killed him. It was working with me.
String.Dest: 我不知道谁杀了他，但是我知道是什么杀了他。它曾和我一起工作。

String.Source: Who do you think it was that killed him?
String.Dest: 你认为是谁杀了他？

String.Source: That's why I always ask for two things. Pay upfront, and next of kin. Now I just gotta find this Bilbus and deliver the news.
String.Dest: 那就是我为什么总是要求两样东西。首先是报酬，然后是家族。我现在要找到这个比尔伯斯然后把消息递出去。

String.Source: Who do you think it was that killed him?
String.Dest: 你认为是谁杀了他？

String.Source: I worked with you and managed to survive.
String.Dest: 我与你一起工作，并且，我还不想死呢。

String.Source: Are you sure about that? You sure you ain't working for someone else? Because the people who live, they always are.
String.Dest: 你肯定吗? 你肯定没有帮别的人办事? 因为那些住在那里的人，一向都是如此。

String.Source: Who do you think it was that killed him?
String.Dest: 你认为是谁杀了他？

String.Source: I worked with you and managed to survive.
String.Dest: 我与你一起工作，并且，我还不想死呢。

String.Source: Don't matter much to me though. Like I said, so long as I live, it counts as a break.
String.Dest: 不要为我操心。就像我说过的，只要我还活着，这些都不算事。

String.Source: Why do you drink Colovian Ale?
String.Dest: 你为什么喝科勒维安麦芽酒?

String.Source: Because that stuff will kill you. I'm half hoping it does. I'll finally meet the one thing luckier than I am!
String.Dest: 因为这酒会杀人啊。好吧其实我还真希望它能杀人。这样至少这辈子我还能亲眼见见比我还有用的东西！

String.Source: Surviving every fight toughens you up.
String.Dest: 战斗后的每一次死里逃生都会使你变得坚强。

String.Source: Some people get dealt a hand like this, they change jobs. Me, I use it to my advantage.
String.Dest: 一些人就是会这样的对待他的天赋，他们换工作。而我，我将它用在我最优势的地方。

String.Source: I once heard about an Elf merc who can't fight a lick, but always manages to come out unscathed. I'd like to try doing a job with him.
String.Dest: 我曾听说一个打不过任何人的精灵雇佣兵，但是他却总能设法让自己毫发无损。我想试着为他工作。

String.Source: I heard about an Elf merc who can't fight a lick, but always manages to come out unscathed. They say he uses bound weapons like your friend here.
String.Dest: 我听说过有一个精灵佣兵打不过任何人，但总能设法让自己毫发无损。他们说他用使用的武器跟你这位朋友很像。

String.Source: I don't know if the Gods have a plan for me, but I know this.
String.Dest: 不知道众神有没有替我规划，但我就是知道。

String.Source: Give me a mug of ale.
String.Dest: Give me a mug of ale.

String.Source: A bottle of mead will do.
String.Dest: 老板，来一杯酒。

String.Source: I'll have a beer.
String.Dest: 我想来一杯啤酒.

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Did you find who you were looking for?
String.Dest: 你找到要找的人了吗？

String.Source: Yeah. Took the news well. It's like his friend was better off dead.
String.Dest: 是啊。带点儿好消息吧。看起来他的朋友比死了还舒服点儿。

String.Source: How do you like the tavern?
String.Dest: 你觉得这酒馆怎么样？

String.Source: I've been to better. It's too drafty for one thing. But I suppose it's a good change of pace.
String.Dest: 我去过更棒的酒馆。这个地方已经挺好了，但我觉得还有进步的空间。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: Uh-huh.
String.Dest: 嗯哼。

String.Source: Tell the barkeep to send over some Colovian Ale.
String.Dest: 让酒保拿些科洛文麦酒来。

String.Source: Yeah?
String.Dest: 啊?

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Need something?
String.Dest: 有事吗？
